content.question: In the later part of the nineteenth century, which of the following would most directly contribute to the continuation of the overall trend shown in the table?

choices.label: Improvements in infrastructure and public-health regulations
Development of new means of contraception and family planning
Creation of large-scale systems of public education
Increased political stability in major European states

content.answer: Improvements in infrastructure and public-health regulations

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
